meeting_summary: Team meeting to discuss priorities for the week, focusing on UI fixes, API performance, wireframes, testing, and API authentication logs.

tasks.title: Fix UI layout issues on dashboard in Safari
tasks.description: Resolve UI responsiveness bugs on the dashboard for Safari users
tasks.reasoning: Sakshi is a React and CSS expert, making her the best fit for this task.
tasks.context: Fixes are needed for the next patch

tasks.title: Improve product listing API query performance
tasks.description: Optimize the product listing API for faster responses
tasks.reasoning: Mohit has expertise in Node.js and PostgreSQL optimization, making him suitable for this task.
tasks.context: Slow API responses are a current issue

tasks.title: Create updated wireframes for the new notification center
tasks.description: Design updated wireframes for the notification center using Figma
tasks.reasoning: Arjun is the team's UI/UX designer with Figma skills, making him the best fit.
tasks.context: Building on last week's successful designs

tasks.title: Conduct full testing coverage for UI fixes
tasks.description: Test the UI fixes using Selenium and Jest
tasks.reasoning: Lata is the QA Engineer with skills in testing, automation, and quality assurance.
tasks.context: Testing depends on Sakshi completing the UI fixes, planning to start on Thursday

tasks.title: Add API authentication logs for analytics
tasks.description: Implement API authentication logs for analytics purposes
tasks.reasoning: Mohit is responsible for backend performance updates, which this task depends on. Assignment is based on role alignment and past experience.
tasks.context: Task is scheduled for next week, depends on backend performance updates being ready
